channel.title: Function description on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Function description on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Data to be evaluated
item.description: Data to be evaluated After the setup of the supplier evaluation(s) is completed, this chapter describes how and at which points in Dynamics 365 Business Central the data is that will later be evaluated based on the ratings that have been set up. During the Collection of “soft” and “hard” factors, different factors are used.

item.title: Evaluation
item.description: Evaluation All available evaluations can be found via the menu item “Supplier evaluation” - “Reports”.

item.title: Setup Wizard
item.description: Setup Wizard The setup wizard is used to create new and edit existing supplier evaluations. It is opened via the menu item “easySUPRA setup wizard”. Users are guided through the setup process in five steps with the help of the wizard. These five steps are described in more detail in the following sections in the form of an activity guide.

item.title: Import / Export
item.description: Import / Export Under “Explore All” - “Administration” - “Supplier Rating” - “Setup” - “Import/Export Setup Data”, data can be exported or imported as .txt files. This allows the setup of the ratings to be used across clients or databases.
